group_1.textLeft: Why are they getting in our way?!
All we want is to free all Magical Girls.

group_1.textRight: This time it was the [textBlue:Rumor] of the Rule of@Ending Friendships.
How many [textBlue:Rumors] does she have to destroy@before she's satisfied?

group_1.textLeft: She's looking for you Mifuyu, correct?

group_1.textCenter: This time she brought a fresh face along@with her. One "Iroha Tamaki".
How should I know. I don't recall ever@meeting her before.

group_1.textLeft: Having more people snooping around for@[textBlue:Rumors] is really annoying, though.

group_1.textRight: (It sounded like Momoko and the members of@her current team were involved, too.)
(Awareness of Rumors is slowly spreading @throughout the Magical Girl community...)
This is exactly why I warned you to stop@making [textBlue:Rumors] that will draw attention.
The more they stand out, the more people@will want to investigate them.

group_1.textCenter: I understand what you're trying to say...
But I don't think that necessarily means@that this [textBlue:Rumor] was a failure.
If I restrict myself according to every@little risk, it will stifle my creativity.
Creative freedom is what allows me to make@things that impact people's feelings.

group_1.textLeft: I really liked that last one, too...

group_1.textRight: (They may have the minds of geniuses, but@emotionally they are still children.)

group_1.textLeft: It already got erased, so we can't do@anything about it now.
But we can't let this keep happening.

group_1.textCenter: Indeed. We must not let Yachiyo Nanami@cause any more trouble for us.
If she keeps on destroying [textBlue:Rumors], the @life force I use up will be for nothing.

group_1.textRight: (It's been a long time since we parted, but@she's still out there searching for me.)
(I need to make her give up, somehow...)

group_1.textCenter: Mifuyu, you can't keep going on like this.
If you are that worried, you can reach out@to Yachiyo Nanami and ask her to join.

group_1.textRight: Join the Wings of the Magius?

group_1.textCenter: You two could reunite, and it would stop her@from destroying our [textBlue:Rumors].
A happy ending for all concerned.

group_1.textRight: Please give me the night to think about it.
